snippet: A new report seriously questions whether the behavioral detection program is objective or worth the cost.
abstract: Editorial cites report released by Homeland Security inspector general's office that raises questions about Transportation Security Administration detection program for screening airline passengers; notes it questions whether program is objective or worth the $878 million spent so far.
lead_paragraph: A new report seriously questions whether the behavioral detection program is objective or worth the cost.

headline.main: That Extra Hurdle at the Airport
headline.print_headline: That Extra Hurdle at the Airport
